attributes.action: Spell Out Most Appropriate Channels When E-Petitions Are Rejected
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is most frustrating when e-petitions are rejected on the grounds of "inappropriate channel" or "outside the scope of government".  In these cases e-petitioners should be given clear advice on how to get adequate consideration of their proposals in all of the right places.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
